lead_paragraph: Six weeks after bringing an end to his playing career, Lleyton Hewitt returned to Australia's Davis Cup team on Thursday ahead of their opener against the United States, though it is unlikely the two-time grand slam champion will take the court this week.

headline.print_headline: Hewitt in Reserve for Davis Cup Tie
headline.main: Hewitt in Reserve for Davis Cup Tie
